column1: prompt
Name 5 mammals found in the North American continent
Generate a pleasant greeting for someone.
Convert the text written in British English to American English. This evening I'll be going for a walk in the park.
Write a response to this comment: I'm so indecisive and always feel stuck.
Summarize the steps for the following process. Making a cup of coffee
What are the two factors that would affect the friction between two surfaces?
Calculate the average grade for the following list of scores. List of scores: 50, 75, 80, 95
Paraphrase the following sentence: Her cat ran away.
Given a document, find the most frequently used words. John went to the store to buy some candy.
Come up with a list of 5 rhetorical questions and their answers.
Find incorrect verb tense in this sentence: He was swimming in a pool.
Convert 18 kilometers per second to miles per hour.
Identify and explain 3 characteristics of a dactyl.
Given a document, determine the sentiment of the text. The new technology is amazing and incredible.
Pick a topic and write a short persuasive essay on it. Advantages and disadvantages of online learning
Name 5 items listed on the UN Human Rights list.
Edit the following sentence: She slip on the ice and fell.
Describe three features of a haiku poem.
Identify the verb tense in the following sentence: She had planted a rosebush in spring.
Calculate the ten's complement of 156.
Categorize the AI technologies mentioned below. Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Robotics
Analyze the given text for the purpose of the author. The use of artificial intelligence can help healthcare institutions reduce cost and improve quality of patient outcomes.
Describe the main components of a computer using 4 descriptive adjectives.
Find out the average salary for a Software Engineer in San Francisco.
Explain 5 common applications of Deep Learning.
Edit the sentence in such a way that it conveys the same meaning while using better grammar. The weather is good, so going out to play was an easy choice.

Summarize the content in the document in specific terms. Document: Soccer, also known as football outside of the United States, is one of the most popular sports in the world. It is estimated that over 250 million people in more than 200 countries and territories play the game. The game is commonly referred to as “The Beautiful Game” because it brings people together and creates a sense of community.
Find the most effective solution for the given situation. The car is not starting even after new battery is installed.

Determine if the report supports the findings or not. Report: The survey indicates that 45% of people prefer to buy online instead of going to the store. 
Findings: Over half of people prefer to buy online.

Name a related topic from the document. Document: The trend in retail analytics is to rely on data to gain insights into customer behavior. This data can be used to improve marketing strategies, optimize product assortment, and predict customer preferences.
Name a specific example of the concept mentioned in the document. Document: A mesh network is a local network topology that is made up of wireless nodes and connecting devices.

Choose the best title for the given document. Document: This document describes the challenges faced by small business owners in the digital age, and how they can respond to these challenges in order to remain successful.

Choose the best answer from the given list of choices. Question: Which of the following is a benefit of cloud computing?
A. Lower cost
B. Reliability
C. Increased scalability
D. All of the above
Give me a list of people who have won the Nobel Prize in Physics
Help me solve this math problem 6+3*2
Explain why this is an inappropriate instruction "Wake me up at 5pm"
Create a review of a movie that you recently watched, based on the input. The movie is "The Greatest Showman", starring Hugh Jackman .
Write a short story that centers around the theme of time.
Imagine you are writing a novel. Write in a few sentences the opening description of your novel.
Create an example of a category of data that could be used to measure customer satisfaction.
Design a categorization scheme for the different types of animals.
Describe an arctic winter in 5 sentences or less.
Find and fix the grammatical errors in this sentence. She goes very often to beach on the weekends

Name 3 methods that can be used for data cleaning.
Create a step-by-step tutorial on setting up a cloud based development environment.
Explain why it is important for a person to have good motor control and coordination.
List 4 advantages of distributed systems.

New Address: 576 Diablo St, Redwood City, CA 94563

Compute the product of 4 and 6.

Create a convincing argument that supports the given statement. Taxes should always be increased to cover governmental expenses.

Describe how to plant a flower.

Summarize this story in 500 words or less. Once upon a time, there was a knight who went on a quest to slay a dragon. He gathered together a group of brave adventurers, and they set out on their journey. Along the way, they encountered all sorts of unexpected obstacles, but in the end were successful in their mission.

How can one develop a successful career in accounting?
What are some tips for managing time efficiently?
Write an outline of a creative writing piece.

Apple - $309.00

Generate a story to explain the meaning of the phrase "out of the box".

Generate a social media post about kindness.
Analyze this sentence and identify errors in grammar, punctuation, and spelling. I saw him yesterday and he said hi

Summarize this article about machine learning. "Machine learning is an area of artificial intelligence that focuses on developing algorithms and systems that can learn from and make predictions from data. It has the potential to revolutionize a wide variety of industries, from medical diagnosis to self-driving cars. Technologies such as deep learning and neural networks have dramatically increased the capabilities of machine learning, and the field is rapidly expanding. Machine learning will continue to be at the forefront of technological innovation in the years to come."
Given a positive integer, generate a sequence of numbers leading to 1. Number: 6

Edit this email to change the tone from negative to positive. Dear John,

We regret to inform you that your application to be a part of our team has been rejected. We understand that you are disappointed, but there were many quality applicants and we could only accept a few.
Categorize each of the items below into either a plant or an animal. Turtle, Wheat, Dog, Apple Tree
Add two new elements to the list below that would increase the diversity of the list. Oats, Rice, Lentils, Wheat
Sort this list of fruits from the sweetest to the least sweet. Banana, Pineapple, Apple, Grapes
